channel.title: Posts on Geo's Page
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Geo's Page

item.title: Deploy Your Own Deeplearning Experiments Manager
item.description: If you are a deeplearning researcher, you really need to structure your experiments very well. Generally, you need to do your experiments repeatedly to find the best hyper-params, the best network structure, etc. Tensorboard is a solution to record all the scalars, images. But it can only save your record files in your local disks. It is ok for individual research or a small team. But if you are working in a large team, you probably need to use the computing cluster (OpenPAI, Hadoop, etc.

item.title: gSLIC Build Error.
item.description:
If you got this error when you build the gSLIC superpixel segmentation algrithm:

/usr/include/c++/5/bits/stl_algobase.h:549:18: error: ambiguous overload for ‘operator=’ (operand types are ‘cv::Rect_’ and ‘cv::Rect_’)

item.title: Reverse Proxy for Nextcloud, Gogs etc.
item.description: If we run multiple web application such as nextcloud and gogs with many ports on one NGINX server, contacting these application with subpath is elegant.

item.title: TorchRecord
item.description: In order to boost the performance of data loading in PyTorch. I write TorchRecord which is similar to the TFRecord of Tensorflow.

item.title: New Look
item.description: I dressed up this blog. I choose HUGO with LeaveIt theme to rebuild this blog. HUGO is really faster than HEXO.
